common.title: AI Grammar Corrector
common.subDescription: Fix spelling and grammar errors and create natural sentences
common.copyFailed: Failed to copy. Please check your browser settings.
common.offlineWarning: You are offline. Please check your internet connection.
common.offlineError: Correction is not available in offline mode.

corrector.placeholder: Enter text to correct. Example: 'I going to school'

howto.title: How to Use
howto.step1: Enter text to correct in the left input area.
howto.step4: See the corrected result on the right.

tech.title: AI Technology Information
tech.description: This service uses Google Gemini AI model to correct text. Gemini excels in natural language processing, understanding context and providing appropriate corrections.

ko.title: Korean Correction
ko.description: Provides spelling, grammar, and vocabulary corrections.

en.title: English Correction
en.description: Provides grammar, punctuation, and expression corrections.

ja.title: Japanese Correction
ja.description: Provides particle, honorific, and expression corrections.

footer.copyright: © 2024 AI Grammar Corrector. All rights reserved.

aiInfo.title: AI Technology Information
aiInfo.description: This service uses the Google Gemini AI model to correct sentences. Gemini has excellent natural language processing capabilities to understand context and provide appropriate corrections.
aiInfo.details: Supports Korean, English, and Japanese, providing corrections in various aspects such as spelling, grammar, vocabulary, particles, honorifics, and expressions.
